entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.US.0177.10133] The value of the difference between NonPeoNeoAvgCompActuallyPaidAmt and NonPeoNeoAvgTotalCompAmt has a value of 5,455,123, which is not equal to the aggregated value of the concept AdjToCompAmt using the dimensionally qualified components on the axis AdjToCompAxis which has an aggregate value of 15,705,393 based on the data in the filing.
The values of the calculation components are as follows: YearEndFairValueOfAwardsGrantedInCurrentFiscalYearMember --> 8,313,597 --> ecd:ExecutiveCategoryAxis=ecd:NonPeoNeoMember, ecd:AdjToCompAxis=mcd:YearEndFairValueOfAwardsGrantedInCurrentFiscalYearMember AdjustmentsForEquityAwardsFailedToMeetPerformanceConditionsMember --> -55,189 --> ecd:AdjToCompAxis=mcd:AdjustmentsForEquityAwardsFailedToMeetPerformanceConditionsMember, ecd:ExecutiveCategoryAxis=ecd:NonPeoNeoMember EquityAwardsValueInCompensationTableForApplicableYearMember --> 5,125,135 --> ecd:ExecutiveCategoryAxis=ecd:NonPeoNeoMember, ecd:AdjToCompAxis=mcd:EquityAwardsValueInCompensationTableForApplicableYearMember ChangeInFairValueOfOutstandingAndUnvestedAwardsGrantedInPriorFiscalYearsMember --> 2,321,850 --> ecd:AdjToCompAxis=mcd:ChangeInFairValueOfOutstandingAndUnvestedAwardsGrantedInPriorFiscalYearsMember, ecd:ExecutiveCategoryAxis=ecd:NonPeoNeoMember ChangeInFairValueAsOfVestingDateOfCurrentYearAwardsVestedDuringCurrentYearMember --> 0 --> ecd:ExecutiveCategoryAxis=ecd:NonPeoNeoMember, ecd:AdjToCompAxis=mcd:ChangeInFairValueAsOfVestingDateOfCurrentYearAwardsVestedDuringCurrentYearMember
The value of the difference between NonPeoNeoAvgCompActuallyPaidAmt and NonPeoNeoAvgTotalCompAmt should equal to the dimensional aggregation of the AdjToCompAxis axis using the concept AdjToCompAmt. Check that the signs used on this element are based on the element AdjToCompAmt. This means that decreases in compensation should be entered as a negative amount irrespective of the member used. This rule aggregates the value of member components located on the axis at the highest level of aggregation to avoid double counting in the event that the company uses a hierarchy of members.
The properties of this fact are: Period :2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:10133 Rule version: 23.0.0RC1 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/63908/000155837023005957/mcd-20230525xdef14a.htm 83
